attributes.action: abandon the introduction of ID cards following HMRC data loss fiasco
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the HMRC loss of 25million personal records while being transferred by post it is clear that we cannot trust the government to look after our personal identities. The idea of trusting the government not to lose biometric data, medical records and all the other goodies they plan on storing is not tenable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
